gate.learning

Class EvaluationBasedOnDocs

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.learning.EvaluationBasedOnDocs

  • public class EvaluationBasedOnDocs
extends Object
    Do evaluation by splitting the documents into training and testing datasets. Two methods of splitting are implemented, namely k-fold and hold-out test.
